ygData.subject: RE: Monk Fighting Gear for Dragons
ygData.msgSnippet: Off the top of my head... Fine Silk Turbin/Crown of Forglok Kings Runed Lava Pendant Bracers of Loyalty of Vox Earrings of  Reflection
ygData.messageBody:
Off the top of my head...

Fine Silk Turbin/Crown of Forglok Kings
Runed Lava Pendant
Bracers of Loyalty of Vox
Earrings of <Insert type here> Reflection
Drakescale Belt
White Wolf Hide Cloak/Cloak of Flames
Lizardscale Mask/Pearlescent Mask

I'm sure there are others I'm forgetting.

Leikung Shii
Bristlebane

-----Original Message-----
From: Michael DuBois [mailto:mdubois@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 12:49 PM
To: 'EQ-Monks@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [EQ-Monks] Monk Fighting Gear for Dragons


From: Michael DuBois <mdubois@...>



I'm in the same situation.

I can say probably to start, you want to get a Gnomish Environment Suit from
the Captain in Sol. A. If I remember right, +10 to both Fire and Cold
resists.

Can anyone fill in the rest please ? Need to know what else I need to get
;-)

Hiscanth Stormriser



-----Original Message-----
From: Lombard.Mikhael [ mailto:Mikhael_Lombard@...
<mailto:Mikhael_Lombard@...> ]
Sent: Wednesday, January 26, 2000 10:40 AM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Monk Fighting Gear for Dragons


From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>

Hi all, being around the level that dragon raids are attempted and such, I
realized that I don't have any resistance gear and such to fight them, I was

wondering if anyone had a nice little list of good dragon fighting equipment

and such. I am looking forward to going out there and kicking butt! Thanks.
